long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Leadhub Pixel Helper is a troubleshooting tool that helps you validate your pixel implementation.

The Leadhub Pixel Helper works in the background to look for Leadhub marketing events to provide realtime feedback on the implementation. Learn more about using Leadhub and Leadhub pixel here: https://leadhub.co/en/
